reasons_to_visit.details: October offers spectacular autumn colors throughout Hradec Kralove's parks, university campus, and riverside areas along the Elbe and Orlice rivers.
Cool, crisp weather perfect for walking and outdoor exploration without summer heat, ideal for exploring the historic center and university district.
Significantly fewer tourists while maintaining good weather and full attraction access to the White Tower, Cathedral of the Holy Spirit, and other landmarks.
Full cultural season resumes with excellent university theater, music performances, and cultural events throughout the city.
Golden autumn light and colorful foliage create ideal photography conditions for the city's unique blend of Gothic and modern architecture.
Perfect weather for enjoying the confluence of the Elbe and Orlice rivers with beautiful autumn colors and peaceful walking conditions.
Lower accommodation prices and fewer crowds make for affordable luxury experiences in this university city.

reasons_to_avoid.details: October weather can be variable with potential for sudden temperature changes and occasional rain showers affecting outdoor plans.
Shorter days (10-11 hours) mean less time for outdoor sightseeing and activities, especially for photography.
Some boat tours and riverside activities may be reduced or unavailable due to cooler weather and water conditions.
University students are in full academic mode, which can affect the typical cultural atmosphere in certain areas.
